thread.title: Man Utd fans slam Match of the Day for ignoring Kouyate horror tackle on Mkhitaryan
thread.title_full: Man Utd fans slam Match of the Day for ignoring Kouyate horror tackle on Mkhitaryan

title: Man Utd fans slam Match of the Day for ignoring Kouyate horror tackle on Mkhitaryan
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Man Utd fans slam Match of the Day for ignoring Kouyate horror tackle on Mkhitaryan MANCHESTER UNITED fans are livid with the BBC after Match of the Day failed to show Cheikhou Kouyate's challenge on Henrikh Mkhitaryan. PUBLISHED: 08:44, Tue, Jan 3, 2017 | UPDATED: 09:25, Tue, Jan 3, 2017 Man United fans slam MOTD for ignoring Kouyate tackle on Mkhitaryan Tue, January 3, 2017 Express Sport brings you the best reactions on Twitter as Match of the Day fail to show Cheikhou Kouyate's tackle on Henrikh Mkhitaryan Getty Images 1 of 14 Match of the Day failed to show West Ham United midfielder Cheikhou Kouyate's challenge on Henrikh Mkhitaryan, and Manchester United fans are not happy 
The West Ham United midfielder escaped a card for a his two-footed lunge on the Armenian winger during Manchester United's 2-0 win at the London Stadium on Monday night. 
The BBC irked Red Devils fans by failing to show the challenge on Match of the Day, leading to accusations of bias directed at the broadcaster. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see some of the best reactions to the tackle, and the BBC's failure to analyse it. Related articles
